.. AmpyFin documentation master file

Welcome to AmpyFin's Documentation
==================================

.. image:: _static/logo.png
   :align: center
   :alt: AmpyFin Logo

AmpyFin is an algorithmic trading project that provides various trading strategies,
training pipelines, testing frameworks, and more.

--------
